/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, hinting at the city's active transportation system. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting light on the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's energy and dynamism.
